TEXT.TITLE: ELECTROSOUND <ESG> SAYS OFFICIAL HAS RESIGNED
TEXT.BODY: ElectroSound Group Inc said Richard Meixner has resigned as senior vice president of the company. The company said they expect the board to appoint Robert Barone, presently president of Electro Sound Inc, a unit of ElectroSound Group, as vice president of operations for ElectroSound Group. ElectroSound said Meixner left the company to explore opportunities with a private company in the recorded music industry. Reuter
